title: ðŸ“œ HayaseDB Discord Rules
description: Welcome to the official HayaseDB Discord! This server is focused on the development and collaboration around the HayaseDB open-source database project. Please read the rules below and react to accept them.

fields.name: 1. Be Respectful
fields.value: Treat everyone with respect. Harassment, personal attacks, and toxic behavior are not tolerated. Keep discussions professional and constructive.

fields.name: 2. Focus on HayaseDB
fields.value: Conversations should primarily center around HayaseDB development, issues, and usage. Off-topic discussions should be kept to designated channels to ensure a productive environment.

fields.name: 3. Promote Your Open Source Work
fields.value: Feel free to share and promote your own open source projects here! We encourage collaboration and making connections with like-minded developers. Just make sure your project aligns with open source principles, and no scams or misleading promotions.

fields.name: 4. No Hate Speech or Discrimination
fields.value: We do not tolerate any hate speech, harassment, or discriminatory behavior. A welcoming space for all developers and contributors is a priority.

fields.name: 5. Stay on Topic
fields.value: Use the appropriate channels for specific discussions (e.g., discussions, ideas). Keeping topics organized ensures efficient communication and development.

fields.name: 6. No Spamming or Unrelated Ads
fields.value: While promoting your open source work is welcome, spamming or advertising unrelated services is prohibited. Always ask a moderator if you're unsure about whatâ€™s appropriate to share.

fields.name: 7. Follow Discord's Terms and Conditions
fields.value: Ensure that both your behavior and any shared projects comply with Discord's Terms of Service. This includes avoiding any illegal content or activities related to your projects.

fields.name: 8. Report Issues Constructively
fields.value: When reporting bugs or issues with HayaseDB, provide as much detail as possible to help others troubleshoot and resolve the problem efficiently.
